languages.text: "Ключ — это кровь династии, что течет по вашим жилам. Лишь с ее помощью возможно пробудить машинного духа сего когитатора. Поместите ладонь в пасть стража-сервитора на приборной панели, чтобы пробудить механизм ото сна".

traits.locale_text: "Ключ — это кровь династии, что течет по вашим жилам. Лишь с ее помощью возможно пробудить машинного духа сего когитатора. Поместите ладонь в пасть стража-сервитора на приборной панели, чтобы пробудить механизм ото сна".
traits.speaker: Nomos_Techpriest_IH-630

languages.text: "The key you seek is the dynastic blood that runs in your veins. It is the only way to rouse this cogitator's machine spirit. When you are ready to do so, place your hand into the mouth of the guardian servitor on the blessed control panel."
languages.original_text: "Ключ — это кровь династии, что течет по вашим жилам. Лишь с ее помощью возможно пробудить машинного духа сего когитатора. Поместите ладонь в пасть стража-сервитора на приборной панели, чтобы пробудить механизм ото сна".

traits.speaker: Nomos_Techpriest_IH-630

traits.locale_text: "The key you seek is the dynastic blood that runs in your veins. It is the only way to rouse this cogitator's machine spirit. When you are ready to do so, place your hand into the mouth of the guardian servitor on the blessed control panel."

traits.locale_text: "The key you seek is the dynastic blood that runs in your veins. It is the only way to rouse this cogitator's machine spirit. When you are ready to do so, place your hand into the mouth of the guardian servitor on the blessed control panel."

traits.locale_text: "The key you seek is the dynastic blood that runs in your veins. It is the only way to rouse this cogitator's machine spirit. When you are ready to do so, place your hand into the mouth of the guardian servitor on the blessed control panel."
traits.speaker: Nomos_Techpriest_IH-630

traits.locale_text: "The key you seek is the dynastic blood that runs in your veins. It is the only way to rouse this cogitator's machine spirit. When you are ready to do so, place your hand into the mouth of the guardian servitor on the blessed control panel."
traits.speaker: Nomos_Techpriest_IH-630

languages.text: 「あなたが探している鍵は、その血管に流れる血統です。これがこの考算機の機械精霊を目覚めさせる唯一の方法です。準備ができたら、祝福された制御パネルのガーディアン・サーヴィターの口に手を入れてください」
languages.original_text: "The key you seek is the dynastic blood that runs in your veins. It is the only way to rouse this cogitator's machine spirit. When you are ready to do so, place your hand into the mouth of the guardian servitor on the blessed control panel."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたが探している鍵は、その血管に流れる血統です。これがこの考算機の機械精霊を目覚めさせる唯一の方法です。準備ができたら、祝福された制御パネルのガーディアン・サーヴィターの口に手を入れてください」
traits.speaker: Nomos_Techpriest_IH-630

languages.text: « La clé que vous cherchez n'est autre que le sang dynastique qui coule dans vos veines. Lui seul peut réveiller l'esprit de la machine de ce cogitateur. Quand vous le voudrez, placez votre main dans la bouche du servitor gardien, sur le panneau de contrôle béni. »
languages.original_text: "The key you seek is the dynastic blood that runs in your veins. It is the only way to rouse this cogitator's machine spirit. When you are ready to do so, place your hand into the mouth of the guardian servitor on the blessed control panel."

traits.locale_text: « La clé que vous cherchez n'est autre que le sang dynastique qui coule dans vos veines. Lui seul peut réveiller l'esprit de la machine de ce cogitateur. Quand vous le voudrez, placez votre main dans la bouche du servitor gardien, sur le panneau de contrôle béni. »
traits.speaker: Nomos_Techpriest_IH-630

languages.text: “所谓的‘鲜血之钥’，就是您血脉中流淌的王朝血液，只有它才能唤醒这台沉思者的机魂。等您准备好之后，将手放在进被祝福的控制面板上，伸到守护机仆的嘴里就好了。”
languages.original_text: "The key you seek is the dynastic blood that runs in your veins. It is the only way to rouse this cogitator's machine spirit. When you are ready to do so, place your hand into the mouth of the guardian servitor on the blessed control panel."

traits.locale_text: “所谓的‘鲜血之钥’，就是您血脉中流淌的王朝血液，只有它才能唤醒这台思考器的机魂。等您准备好之后，将手放在进被祝福的控制面板上，伸到守护奴工的嘴里就好了。”
traits.speaker: Nomos_Techpriest_IH-630

languages.text: «La llave que busca es la sangre dinástica que corre por sus venas. Es la única forma de despertar al espíritu máquina de este cogitador. Cuando esté preparad{mf|o|a} para hacerlo, coloque su mano en la boca del servidor guardián del bendito panel de control».
languages.original_text: "The key you seek is the dynastic blood that runs in your veins. It is the only way to rouse this cogitator's machine spirit. When you are ready to do so, place your hand into the mouth of the guardian servitor on the blessed control panel."

traits.locale_text: «La llave que busca es la sangre dinástica que corre por sus venas. Es la única forma de despertar al espíritu máquina de este cogitador. Cuando esté preparad{mf|o|a} para hacerlo, coloque su mano en la boca del servidor guardián del bendito panel de control».
traits.speaker: Nomos_Techpriest_IH-630

languages.text: "Der Schlüssel, den Ihr sucht, ist das dynastische Blut, das in Euren Adern fließt. Es ist der einzige Weg, den Maschinengeist dieses Cogitators zu wecken. Wenn Ihr dazu bereit seid, legt Eure Hand in den Mund des Wächterservitors auf dem gesegneten Bedienfeld."
languages.original_text: "The key you seek is the dynastic blood that runs in your veins. It is the only way to rouse this cogitator's machine spirit. When you are ready to do so, place your hand into the mouth of the guardian servitor on the blessed control panel."

traits.locale_text: "Der Schlüssel, den Ihr sucht, ist das dynastische Blut, das in Euren Adern fließt. Es ist der einzige Weg, den Maschinengeist dieses Cogitators zu wecken. Wenn Ihr dazu bereit seid, legt Eure Hand in den Mund des Wächterservitors auf dem gesegneten Bedienfeld."
traits.speaker: Nomos_Techpriest_IH-630

languages.text: "Aradığınız anahtar, asil kanınızın ta kendisidir. Bu kavramsayarın makine ruhunu uykusundan uyandıracak tek şey budur. Hazır olduğunuzda elinizi, kutsal kontrol panelindeki muhafız hizmetörün ağzına yerleştirin."
languages.original_text: "The key you seek is the dynastic blood that runs in your veins. It is the only way to rouse this cogitator's machine spirit. When you are ready to do so, place your hand into the mouth of the guardian servitor on the blessed control panel."

traits.locale_text: "Aradığınız anahtar, damarlarınızda akan asil kanda mevcuttur. Bu kavramsayarın makine ruhunu uykusundan uyandıracak tek şey budur. Hazır olduğunuzda elinizi, kutsal kontrol panelindeki muhafız hizmetörün ağzına yerleştirin."
traits.speaker: Nomos_Techpriest_IH-630
